example.content:
# sho interface | inc Interface
Interface Ethernet0/0 "", is up, line protocol is up Interface Ethernet0/1 "", is up, line protocol is up Interface Ethernet0/2 "", is administratively down, line protocol is down Interface Ethernet0/3 "", is administratively down, line protocol is down Interface Ethernet0/4 "", is administratively down, line protocol is down Interface Ethernet0/5 "", is administratively down, line protocol is down Interface Ethernet0/6 "", is administratively down, line protocol is down Interface Ethernet0/7 "", is administratively down, line protocol is up Interface Vlan1 "inside", is up, line protocol is up Interface Vlan2 "outside", is up, line protocol is up Interface Vlan1024 "dummy", is down, line protocol is down Interface Vlan2000 "DMZ2", is down, line protocol is down Interface Vlan2048 "DMZ1", is down, line protocol is down
